articles.author: Stephen Battaglio
articles.title: Why did Disney take such a big gamble on 'Roseanne'? Blame the uncertain TV market
articles.description: Roseanne Barr had a track record of provocative tweets, statements and actions, but her name was ratings gold in a barren network TV landscape.

articles.author: Nick Wadhams
articles.title: Top North Korean Adviser Meets Pompeo in New York to Plan Summit
articles.description: A top North Korean official met Secretary of State Mike Pompeo for dinner in New York on Thursday night, the highest-level talks between the two countries on American soil in 18 years as the Trump administration works to prepare for a summit in Singapore with the isolated regime.

articles.author: http://www.nytimes.com/by/alan-feuer, http://www.nytimes.com/by/benjamin-weiser
articles.title: Judge Suggests Review of Cohen Documents Is Moving Too Slowly
articles.description: Lawyers for Mr. Cohen were given a June 15 deadline to review the documents seized from his office, apartment and hotel room.

articles.title: Trump, fast-food lover and exercise avoider, tells nation about importance of fitness
articles.description: The president is scheduled to talk to children about the importance of exercise at the White House Sports and Fitness Day.

articles.author: http://www.nytimes.com/by/frances-robles
articles.title: ‘You’ll All Know Who I Am,’ Parkland Suspect Said in Video
articles.description: The authorities in Florida have released a video from the cellphone of the teenager who killed 17 people in Parkland, Fla.

articles.author: http://www.nytimes.com/by/daniel-victor
articles.title: Sarah Huckabee Sanders Chokes Up at Student’s Question on Shootings
articles.description: A 13-year-old boy asked what the Trump administration was doing to prevent violence in schools.

articles.author: the Associated Press
articles.title: Grand Jury Indicts Harvey Weinstein in Rape Case
articles.description: Manhattan District Attorney Cyrus Vance Jr. on Wednesday announced the indictment, saying it brings the former movie mogul "another step closer to accountability."

articles.author: Greg Ip
articles.title: Trump Shows How Not to Be a Protectionist
articles.description: President Donald Trump routinely does protectionism badly, using the wrong tools on the wrong behavior and the wrong countries, writes Greg Ip. Here are some lessons in how to do protectionism well.

articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: Americans viewed Hurricane Maria as if it was happening in another country
articles.description: Hurricane Maria may have killed more than 4,600 Americans in Puerto Rico, according to a recent academic report, but Americans paid a lot less attention to the storm compared to storms of similar or even lesser magnitude.

articles.author: Sara M Moniuszko
articles.title: Donald Trump: I had a 'great' meeting with Kim Kardashian at the White House
articles.description: The reality TV star met with President Trump at the White House to discuss prison reform Wednesday. During the meeting, she was expected to advocate for the release of 62-year-old Alice Marie Johnson.
